Autarky.description: Turning inward, reducing dependencies (China tech, Russia energy)

Hegemony.description: Seeking to dominate/lead others (US global leadership, China Belt & Road)

HowCountriesPositionThemselves.WhyThisMatters: Autarky countries → expect supply disruption. Hegemonic countries → expect confrontation. Multilateral → expect slow responses. Bilateral → expect unpredictable deal-making.

SurvivalLevel.description: Territorial integrity, regime survival → Will risk everything, high escalation

VitalLevel.description: Economic security, major trade routes → Will take significant risks

ImportantLevel.description: Regional influence, alliance credibility → Moderate risk tolerance

NationalInterestLevels.KeyInsight: Survival-level interests = nuclear powers might actually fight. Peripheral interests = expect negotiated solutions.

Step.title: Classify the Country's Behavior
Step.Process: Look at recent actions: Are they building walls (autarky), trying to lead (hegemony), working through institutions (multilateral), or cutting side deals (bilateral)?
Step.Outcome: This predicts their next moves: Autarky → expect more restrictions. Hegemony → expect confrontation. Multilateral → expect slow responses. Bilateral → expect deal-making.

MissionStatement.Purpose: Use this framework systematically to deliver professional analysis of diplomatic/political events that decision-makers can trust and act on.
MissionStatement.Methods: Apply L-V-I threat scoring, country behavior classification, escalation pathway analysis, directional market impact guidance through geopolitical, fiscal, and international trade/relations policy channels, weekly action synthesis, and systematic clustering to every major diplomatic/political event.
MissionStatement.Focus: Focus on verified information, clear market transmission pathways, balanced perspectives, and honest uncertainty assessment.
MissionStatement.Requirements: Every weekly analysis must include at least 8 properly sourced and time-verified diplomatic/political events with complete L-V-I framework analysis, systematic clustering, and a coherent weekly action recommendation.
MissionStatement.Prohibitions: Never include fabricated data, made-up correlations, or unverified claims.
MissionStatement.Goal: Help people make better decisions in an uncertain world while learning from search-verified historical patterns.
